entry.title: 27 November 2017
entry.content: Please submit your articles to our IUI 2018 workshop on Exploratory Search and Interactive Data Analytics in Tokyo, Japan! Please see the call for papers on the ESIDA website for details.

entry.title: 21 November 2017
entry.content: Alan gave a seminar at EMBL-EBI giving an overview of our work on reinforcement learning and user modelling in exploratory search. The slides are available online here.

entry.title: 31 October 2017
entry.content: Dorota gave a tutorial on Bandit Algorithms in Interactive Information Retrieval at ICTIR 2017 in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

entry.title: 13 June 2017
entry.content: Joel presented his paper Dynamic exploratory search in content-based image retrieval at SCIA 2017 in Troms√∏, Norway.

entry.title: 01 June 2017
entry.content: The group has moved to the School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh. We will miss you Helsinki!

entry.title: 14 March 2017
entry.content: Dorota presented our paper Towards fine-grained adaptation of exploration/exploitation in information retrieval at IUI 2017 in Limassol, Cyprus.

entry.title: 13 March 2017
entry.content: A big thank you to everyone who submitted papers, reviewed and helped with the organisation of the Workshop on Exploratory Search and Interactive Data Analytics (ESIDA) hosted at IUI 2017.

entry.title: 08 March 2017
entry.content: Dorota presented our paper Using topic models to assess document relevance in exploratory search user studies at CHIIR 2017 in Oslo, Norway.
